cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.6)

set(RTGU_CURRENT_LIB_NAME "UnitTest++")
string(TOUPPER "${RTGU_CURRENT_LIB_NAME}" RTGU_CURRENT_LIB_ID)

set(CMAKE_INCLUDE_CURRENT_DIR ON)

file(GLOB SOURCE_FILES *.cpp)
file(GLOB WIN32_SOURCE_FILES Win32/*.cpp)

add_library(lib${RTGU_CURRENT_LIB_NAME} STATIC ${SOURCE_FILES} ${WIN32_SOURCE_FILES})

SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(lib${RTGU_CURRENT_LIB_NAME} PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME lib${RTGU_CURRENT_LIB_NAME}${RTGU_LIB_SUFFIX})
